group_1.narration: I ran into Kaede and a copy of her@while inside the Mirror Witch's Labyrinth.
The fake attacked me without hesitation,@and while I knew she wasn't who she@appeared to be, I just couldn't fight back...
Thankfully Yachiyo appeared and saved me!

group_1.textLeft: ...Okay.@Looks like we're done here.

group_1.textRight: Yachiyo!

group_1.textLeft: Fake or not, that Kaede@had quite the mouth on her...
...You must carry a lot of@stress in that head of yours...

group_1.textRight: That was all the fake!@I'm not that stressed!
Wait, never mind that!@There are more important questions!
Like, what are you doing here, Yachiyo?!

group_1.textLeft: I'm one of the Kamihama Magical Girls.@Is it really that strange that I'm here?
I could ask the same of you two.

group_1.textRight: ...Well, you do have a point...@...Huh? No, wait!
That wasn't what I wanted to ask, either...!

group_1.textLeft: You meant to ask why I'm here.

group_1.textRight: Yes!

group_1.textLeft: ...Well...

group_1.textRight: Uh-huh!

group_1.textLeft: I just happened to be here.

group_1.textRight: ...You what?

group_1.textLeft: I come here every once in@a while to explore the place.
It's an extremely unusual Labyrinth.@There's too much I don't know about it.
I can't ignore it...
...so I've been keeping an eye on it.
And this time you both showed up...
So yeah, I just happened to be here.

group_1.textRight: I see...
So this Labyrinth is pretty mysterious, @even for you, Yachiyo...

group_1.textLeft: So, what about you two?

group_1.textRight: Well, I got an invitation... That's when @Mitama convinced me to check it out.

group_1.textLeft: *Sigh* Mitama, huh?@She's got quite the way with words...

group_1.textRight: I came here with Momoko and Rena...
Oh no, that's right!@Momoko and Rena!
What's wrong?!
I got separated from them!

group_1.textLeft: So all three of you came here together?@

group_1.textRight: Yes, we did...
This is the second time we've been here...
Last time we had to leave right away @because I wasn't strong enough...
Did you leave...?@Or did the enemies chase you out...?

group_1.textLeft: You left by choice...right?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
Wait, you can just leave...?@Like, whenever you want?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.@...I'll explain later.

group_1.textRight: O-okay!
[chara:100100:lipSynch_0](So I CAN get out...@Well, that's good news...)

group_1.textLeft: So, then what...?

group_1.textRight: Oh, right...
Then I worked to get a little bit stronger...
And Rena said she wanted@to try coming here again...
But my copy scared me, and then they…

group_1.textLeft: ...They were gone...

group_1.textRight: *Sniff*... Yes!

group_1.textLeft: So your friends vanished...
Well, you're certainly not the@first to have that happen here...

group_1.textRight: Does it...happen a lot...?

group_1.textLeft: This place is a Labyrinth in every sense @of the word. A peculiar one at that.
But you can enter and exit whenever you like.
You can retrace your steps if you keep @track of your own magic when you enter.
But the surface structure is strangely @connected, and it's always changing...
Which is why we call this Labyrinth...

group_1.textRight: Endless Mirrors…

group_1.textLeft: Yep...
Let's go back to where you saw Mitama.
Rena and Momoko might have@gone back there themselves.

group_1.textRight: !@Good idea!
Got it...!
Um...

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah?

group_1.textRight: Sorry, it's just... @So much is happening, and...um...
I'm sorry I wasn't more helpful!

group_1.textLeft: Don't worry about it, Kaede.
Oh, and Iroha.
I'm pretty sure I've been looking out for you@since you got to Kamihama. Am I wrong?

group_1.textRight: Um, well... I guess... Thank you.

group_1.textLeft: ...Don't mention it.@Now, let's get going.

group_1.textRight: Okay...!
